Fall_River.John M. Earle House: The John M. Earle House is a historic house located at 352 Durfee Street in Fall River, Massachusetts. It was built in 1870 by John M. Earle, a carpenter in the Italianate Villa style. The Earle House is located on Durfee Street in a once more fashionable neighborhood which has suffered from downtown commercial encroachment.
